snippet.title: Praey for the Gods - Gameplay Announcement Trailer | PS5
snippet.description:
Praey for the Gods is coming to both the PS5 and PS4 in Q1 2021.

A boss climbing action-adventure game set in an atmospheric open world. You play as a lone hero sent to the edge of a dying frozen world to discover the mystery behind a never-ending winter. Arriving with only the clothes on your back, you must survive the colossal dangers that you encounter. To restore balance and reclaim the land from the brink, you will be faced with questions that not even a God knows the answer to.
 
All footage captured on PS5.
